mapper.insert: insert into party (idx, ID, nickName, category, location, subject, content, place, partyGender, mealDate, photo, acholchk, ip, minLimitAge, maxLimitAge, limitNum, show) values (party_idx_seq.nextval, #{ID}, #{nickName}, #{category}, #{location}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{place}, #{partyGender}, #{mealDate}, #{photo}, #{acholchk}, #{ip}, #{minLimitAge}, #{maxLimitAge}, #{limitNum}, 'YES')
mapper.select: select count(*) from party where show = 'YES' and mealDate > SYSDATE ORDER BY mealDate
select * from party where ID = #{ID} and show = 'YES' and mealDate > SYSDATE ORDER BY mealDate
select * from party where idx = #{idx} and show = 'YES' and mealDate > SYSDATE ORDER BY mealDate
select * from party where idx = #{idx} and show = 'YES' and mealDate > SYSDATE ORDER BY mealDate
mapper.update: update party set show = 'NO' where idx = #{idx}
update party set subject = #{subject} , content = #{content} where idx = #{idx}
update party set deleteReport = #{deleteReport} + 1 where idx = #{idx}
